Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: This is not a bug, it is an enhancement. Yes, it could be improved, but we are past that.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~greg.haskins can we please defer this to 1.1? While I don't disagree, there are a gazillion other more important things. Also, not a bug but improvement.

Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: Sorry, wasn't dictating classification or timeline. I think at least in the case of Type, it was the default.

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Hi, I've been working through the node sdk backlog with the maintainers and as this was raised some time ago, I'm closing. The high-level node sdk APIs have been available for some time, and this issue may be covered by functionality provided there: https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/write_first_app.html Please re-open if this issue is still affecting you, and the functionality is not available in the low-level or high-level node sdk APIs, thanks.
